Producer: Tyler Perry, Mark E. Swinton, Will Areu, Ozzie Areu
Synopsis: A joyous reunion in small-town Georgia turns into an unexpected nightmare when Madea, Joe, Aunt Bam and other family members gather for an anniversary party that turns out to be a sham. Instead of fun and relaxation, Madea and the gang soon find themselves attending an elaborate funeral that doesn't quite go according to plan.
Title: Tyler Perry's A Madea Family Funeral
